result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

chargeModifiers.descr: PTAC, as a Party to a Crime

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. GREGGORY M HOLMAN

records.addlTxt: Review hearing on November 29, 2022 at 01:30 pm.

10:20 AM Defendant GREGGORY M HOLMAN in court.  Attorney Ryan Scott Ulrich in court for GREGGORY M HOLMAN.  Attorney Matthew Steven McElroy in court for State of Wisconsin. Atty Ulrich states def will be waiving the right to a prelim. Def concurs. Court instructs the defendant regarding his/her right to a preliminary examination. Defendant waives his/her right to a preliminary examination. Court finds probable cause. Court accepts the waiver of the prelim and binds the defendant over for trial. 

State files an information with the court and confirms it mirrors the criminal complaint. Attorney Ulrich acknowledges receipt of the information and waives any reading. Atty Ulrich enters a plea of Not Guilty on behalf of the defendant on all counts. Court will set for Return Date on November 07, 2022 at 10:30 AM


Court adjourned at 10:22 AM
Return date scheduled for November 7, 2022 at 10:30 am.
Return date on November 7, 2022 at 10:30 am.
Preliminary Hearing - Schedule or Waiver on August 2, 2022 at 10:00 am.

No Contact with the victims. Forms of no contact include: in person, in writing, by telephone, by e-mail, or by any other forms of electronic communication, or through a third party intending to circumvent the no contact provision. Defendant is to maintain absolute sobriety - not to possess or consume any alcohol, illegal drugs or prescription drugs without a valid prescription.  You may be randomly tested for compliance. Defendant is to complete processing with the Green Lake County Sheriff's Department.

Adjustment Number: 22A 010208,
Payable Number: 68941,
Receipt Number: 22R 002894,
Amount: $20.00

No Contact with the victims. Forms of no contact include: in person, in writing, by telephone, by e-mail, or by any other forms of electronic communication, or through a third party intending to circumvent the no contact provision. Defendant is to maintain absolute sobriety - not to possess or consume any alcohol, illegal drugs or prescription drugs without a valid prescription.  You may be randomly tested for compliance. Defendant is to complete processing with the Green Lake County Sheriff's Department.

9:10 AM Defendant GREGGORY M HOLMAN in court.  Attorney Gerise Laspisa in court for State of Wisconsin. Defendant confirms receipt of the criminal complaint and waives reading. Court instructs the defendant of the maximum penalty on each count and as repeater. Court instructs defendant of his/her right to an attorney.  DA makes bond recommendation. Court sets bond at $500 cash bond and conditions of: No Contact with the victims. Forms of no contact include: in person, in writing, by telephone, by e-mail, or by any other forms of electronic communication, or through a third party intending to circumvent the no contact provision. Defendant is to maintain absolute sobriety - not to possess or consume any alcohol, illegal drugs or prescription drugs without a valid prescription.  You may be randomly tested for compliance. Defendant is to complete processing with the Green Lake County Sheriff's Department. Court instructs defendant regarding his/her right to a preliminary hearing. Defendant waives the time limits. Court will set for Status of Counsel on August 2, 2022 at 10:00 AM.

Court adjourned at 9:13 AM
